# THIS FILE HAS BEEN GENERATED BY THE BUILD CONFIGURATION SYSTEM - DO NOT EDIT

set(MINECPP_RECIPES_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

add_executable(minecpp_recipes)

# Public include headers
target_include_directories(minecpp_recipes
  PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include
  PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/minecpp/recipes
)

# Source subdirectory
add_subdirectory("src")

target_link_libraries(minecpp_recipes
        LINK_PRIVATE
        minecpp_network
        minecpp_game
        minecpp_repository
        Boost::program_options
        Boost::iostreams
)
